Text IQ | Senior Software Engineer | Vancouver, BC | Full-Time | http://www.textiq.com/

Text IQ uses groundbreaking AI technology to prevent high-stakes compliance and legal disasters. As a small team, we serve many high-stake clients including tech giants, Dow Jones companies, and government agencies. (I wish I could tell you the names.) We are well-funded and we have been continuously profitable.

http://www.textiq.com/careers/#op-137591-senior-software-eng...
